entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow beginning this afternoon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 26 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending late this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Friday 17 February 2023
